column4: hi all, i could do with some help. Im trying to fix my broken Xorg.conf so i have booted a live CD but cannot find Xorg.conf file
Live CD will not use xorg.conf  file.
Basically, the way it works now-days is that you only need xorg.conf file if you have a proprietary driver.
i have the same issue with login, cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log doesnt have any gaping errors
